After his stirring performance listing the conclusive proof of Saddam Hussein 's weapons of mass destruction, and his unquestionable ties to al-Qaeda, Colin Powell completed the slam dunk by moving towards the conclusion of his speech with this, My friends, this has been a long and a detailed presentation, and I thank you for your patience. But there is one more subject that I would like to touch on briefly, and it should be a subject of deep and continuing concern to this council: Saddam Hussein 's violations of human rights.
